wf_workflow_version.description: Manage the Incident associated with an Alarm
wf_workflow_version.name: Alarm Incident Workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Manage the Incident associated with an Alarm
wf_workflow.name: Alarm Incident Workflow

wf_activity.name: Check to see if incident group has been set

sys_variable_value.value: incident.assignment_groupISEMPTY^EQ
incident.assignment_groupISEMPTY^EQ

activity.display_value: Check to see if incident group has been set
Check to see if incident group has been set

sys_variable_value.value: XXX - Ending workflow - Turns out Incident has been assigned already
XXX - Ending workflow - Turns out Incident has been assigned already
XXX - The Alarm has cleared. Going to check for group assignment
XXX - The Alarm has cleared. Going to check for group assignment

wf_activity.name: Log Auto Close From Alarm Update

sys_variable_value.value: XXX - The incident has received an Alarm Update. It has been assigned to the Service Desk so it cannot be automatically closed
XXX - The incident has received an Alarm Update. It has been assigned to the Service Desk so it cannot be automatically closed

activity.display_value: Log Auto Close From Alarm Update

wf_activity.name: Log Auto Close From Alarm Update

sys_variable_value.value: The incident has been automatically closed from an Alarm Update
The incident has been automatically closed from an Alarm Update

activity.display_value: Log Auto Close From Alarm Update

sys_variable_value.value: The Alarm Workflow has hit the Incident Resolved leg
The Alarm Workflow has hit the Incident Resolved leg
status=clear^EQ

status=clear^EQ

incident.state=6^EQ
incident.state=6^EQ
